pages.text: Wa 'Idha Qila Lahum Ta`alaw Yastaghfir Lakum Rasulu Allahi Lawwaw Ru'usahum Wa Ra'aytahum Yasudduna Wa Hum Mustakbiruna
Sawa'un `Alayhim 'Astaghfarta Lahum 'Am Lam Tastaghfir Lahum Lan Yaghfira Allahu Lahum 'Inna Allaha La Yahdi Al-Qawma Al-Fasiqina
Humu Al-Ladhina Yaquluna La Tunfiqu `Ala Man `Inda Rasuli Allahi Hatta Yanfađđu Wa Lillahi Khaza'inu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Lakinna Al-Munafiqina La Yafqahuna
Yaquluna La'in Raja`na 'Ila Al-Madinati Layukhrijanna Al-'A`azzu Minha Al-'Adhalla Wa Lillahi Al-`Izzatu Wa Lirasulihi Wa Lilmu'uminina Wa Lakinna Al-Munafiqina La Ya`lamuna
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu La Tulhikum 'Amwalukum Wa La 'Awladukum `An Dhikri Allahi Wa Man Yaf`al Dhalika Fa'ula'ika Humu Al-Khasiruna
Wa 'Anfiqu Min Ma Razaqnakum Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiya 'Ahadakumu Al-Mawtu Fayaqula Rabbi Lawla 'Akhartani 'Ila 'Ajalin Qaribin Fa'assaddaqa Wa 'Akun Mina As-Salihina
Wa Lan Yu'uakhira Allahu Nafsaan 'Idha Ja'a 'Ajaluha Wa Allahu Khabirun Bima Ta`maluna
